page.title: 09Biography
page.content: John Ward, Royal Academician and eminent portrait painter lives at Bilting. Chosen by the Prince of Wales as his teacher, he also illustrates books with distinctive line drawings and paints the scene at special occasions like royal weddings. Mr. G.V.L. Allen , Bilting Cottage, is the ex-chairman of the National Mushroom Growers and his wife, Rosalind, ex-County Chairman of the East Kent Federation of Womens' Institutes and organiser of events to commemorate the author, Jane Austen. Dr. Gerald Flack, Wye village general Practitioner lives at Further Northfield, Bilting.
